channel.title: Stats on Enrico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Stats on Enrico's Blog

item.title: Learning: neither Deep nor Machine, just Human
item.description: On one side I am intrigued by Data Analysis and Visualization (see some of my D3 [et al.] blocks or my R project) and on the other side by Machine Learning. For ML I am very slowly going thru some MOOC: Andrew Ng’s Machine Learning. Statistical Learning by Stanford University Profs. Trevor Hastie and Rob Tibshirani. Daphne Koller’s Probabilistic Graphical Models. Wish me luck.
